import './Flashsale.css' import cardimg1 from '../../../Data/images/flash sale/1.jpg' import cardimg2 from '../../../Data/images/flash sale/1(5).jpg' import cardimg3 from '../../../Data/images/flash sale/1 (1).jpg' import cardimg4 from '../../../Data/images/flash sale/1 (2).jpg' import cardimg5 from '../../../Data/images/flash sale/1 (3).jpg' import cardimg6 from '../../../Data/images/flash sale/1 (4).jpg' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Stars from '../../Utilities/reusable/Stars' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Flaschsale = () => { const [timer, setTimer] = useState(100000); useEffect(() => { const intervalId = setInterval(() => { setTimer((prevTimer) => { if (prevTimer === 0) { clearInterval(intervalId); // return 0; } return prevTimer - 1; }); }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(intervalId) }); const formattedTime = new Date(timer * 1000).toISOString().substr(11, 8) // return {formattedTime}; const random = useDispatch() const randomData = useSelector((state) => (state.array2)) console.log(randomData) return (
Flash Sales Don't Miss !!
Time Left {formattedTime}
SEE ALL
{ randomData?.map((item) => { return (
{item.name}
EGP {item.price}
EGP {item.oldprice}
Jumia express
{/*
3 items left
*/}
{/* */}

) } export default Flaschsale;
